title: An Update From Kirk Minihane
description:
After a wild Friday, and with his future at Barstool Sports in doubt, Kirk Minihane takes a break from his vacation to explain to the Minifans what's happening.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
